detail_desc: Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with reflective details and soft fleece inside. Detachable hood with soft fleece inside and a stand-up collar with a zip and chin guard at the front. Front pockets, ribbing at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with reflective details and soft fleece inside. Detachable hood with soft fleece inside and a stand-up collar with a zip and chin guard at the front. Front pockets, ribbing at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Lightly padded, print-patterned bomber jacket with a small, ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, flap side pockets with a press-stud, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Treggings in soft, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Treggings in soft, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Treggings in soft, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Treggings in soft, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Ankle-length trousers in sturdy jersey with a concealed zip in one side, a welt back pocket and sewn-in creases at the front.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable hood, stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and zipped front pockets. Pile lining.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable hood, stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and zipped front pockets. Pile lining.

Padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Detachable hood in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the back, and a small, ribbed stand-up collar. Zip down the front, side pockets with a press-stud, gathered seams down the sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Biker jacket in imitation leather with a diagonal zip down the front and notch lapels with decorative buttons. Quilted sections at the sides and cuffs, and zipped side pockets. Lined.
Cardigan in soft, fluffy faux fur with long sleeves and no fasteners. Jersey lining.
Cardigan in soft, fluffy faux fur with long sleeves and no fasteners. Jersey lining.
Cardigan in soft, fluffy faux fur with long sleeves and no fasteners. Jersey lining.
Short jersey skirt with ties at the waist, a concealed zip and button at one side and a seam with a flounce at the hem.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.
